name: ScreaM (OLODiman11, S1rMekr)
description:
You are a sinful soul wishing revenge!

Your Boss made you work really hard despite of your pleas. Last week you had caught a serious cold and after 3 days of unstopable labour you died.

Now you seek for revenge. You came to your boss in a dream to destroy the rest of his life.

Be smart: You need to scare your Boss 3 times in a row to get an access to jumpscare him. While exploring the flat, you will find some special items which will allow you to commit your evil deed. With one item you can scare only one time.

Remember: The stress scale is reducing every second, so you need to act fast. You can possess furniture in order to jumpscare the boss. But it's nessecary for you to fulfiil the scale at least to 70% when it starts flickering, then you can jumpscare the boss when the object highlightered red.

Start Boss's nightmare by ringing the door's bell.

Controls:
WASD - movement
E - interact
R - restart the game
Esc - cancel
